name: The Block Dungeon
description:
Press W, A, S, D to move

The left mouse button fires, and the bullet will be fired in the direction of your mouse pointer

At present, the dungeon is a fixed terrain

There will be four boss snakes in the dungeon. They will attack you and throw out small snakes to fight with you

The attack box will randomly generate monsters and bullets, and the monsters will attack you

The current version of the player character will not die, just test the game.

If you have any suggestions, please put your ideas in the comment area below at any time
